topic.shortdesc:
Short description is placed in X/HTML metadata with text-only mode.

body.p: As of DITA-OT 2.5 only quotes and menu cascades generate text in the text-only mode, but some other elements have their own text-only processing so I've added them. All are specified above in the image's alt text, which also goes to text only.
